すみません、いきなり押しかけてしまって。: I'm sorry for barging in so suddenly.
食事中だった: We were in the middle of eating.
えぇっ！？す、すみません、気遣いができてなくて……: Huh?! I-I'm sorry, I wasn't very considerate...
じょ、冗談だ。気にしないでくれ。: I-I'm just kidding. Don't worry about it.
それで、わざわざ俺に会いに来たんだ。\n他の連中には相談できないことを話しに来た: That's why you came all the way here to see me. You came to tell me something you couldn't discuss with the others, right?
俺が促すと、めるは少し躊躇してから、\nやがて口を開いた。: At my urging, Meguru hesitates for a moment, then finally opens her mouth.
はい……実は、その……カオスメイデンとの公式競技なんですけど、\n勝てるかどうか:
Yes... Actually, umm... It's an official competition with Chaos Maiden, but I'm starting to worry about whether or not I can win the
...
私がまた足を引っ張っちゃうんじゃないかって……: I thought I might get in the way again...
今日の模擬戦では活躍していただろ。\nむしろ、めるがもたらした勝利と言っても過言: You were active in today's mock battle, weren't you? If anything, it's no exaggeration to say that Meguru won.
葵から言われたカオスメイデンの情報のせいで、\n委縮してしまってるみたいだな。:
It looks like the information Aoi told us about Chaos Maiden has caused the
to shrink.
……また弱虫に逆戻りか？: ...Are you going back to being a weakling again?
すみません……でも、ユリアさんには私の技も通用しないかもって\n考えると、どんど: I'm sorry... But when I thought about how my technique might not work on Julia, I started to think worse and worse...
うーん。この調子で悪い方へ堂々巡りされると、\nかなりよくないな。: Hmm. It's not good to go around in circles like this.
やれやれ……いいか？ 今から俺が言うことは、\n他のやつらには絶対に言うなよ？: Good grief... Okay? Don't tell anyone else what I'm about to say, <b>, okay?
まず、このＭＧ競技ってのは、厳密には公平な競技じゃない。: First of all, this MG competition wasn’t strictly fair.
あのな、校舎ごとに使用するＭＧのタイプが違う時点で\n完全にイーブンな条件で戦え:
You know, when MG types are used in each school building, there's no way you can fight under completely even conditions like
.
そもそもパイロットの本来の任務ってのはメイズの探索だろ？\nＭＧ同士の戦いはそこ:
In the first place, the pilot’s original mission was to search for Mayse, right? Battles between
MGs shouldn’t be that important.
ならば何故、この学校ではそれを競技として扱っているのか。: In that case, why did this school treat it as a competition?
ＭＧ競技の目的は『勝つこと』じゃない。\n勝利を目指して己を研ぎ澄ますことにある:
The MG Competition's goal isn't to “win.” I think it's to hone myself, aiming for a
victory.
え……それって必ずしも勝つ必要はない、ということですか？: Huh...? Does that mean we don't necessarily need to win?
そうは言ってないが、負けたら終わりってことでもない。\n要は己の鍛錬の理由として:
I didn't say that, but if I lost, it wouldn't be the end. The
point was that victory was just the reason for my training.
つまり、ＭＧ競技はスポーツじゃなくて武道なんだよ。: In other words, MG Games are martial arts, not sports.
武道の試合なのだから、勝ち負けに固執するべきではない。\n大切なのは己を磨くこと:
This is a martial arts match, so you shouldn't stick to winning or losing.
What's important is to improve yourself. That's the essence of martial arts.
だから、負けてもいいとは言わないが、勝ちに固執するのはよくない。\n試合はあくま:
That’s why I’m not saying it’s okay to lose, but sticking to winning isn’t good. The
match is just a place for training, after all.
たとえ相手に力が及ばなかったとしても、お前が怖れることなく\n鍛錬の成果を発揮で:
Even if you can't match your opponent, as long as you can show off the results of your
training without fear, the goal of the match has been achieved.
%usernameusernameuserna%さんの言いたいことはわかります。: %username, username, userna% I understand what you're trying to say. But if we lose the next battle, we'll be expelled...
お前が全力を発揮した上で負けたのなら、それは指導した俺の責任だ。\n責めるなら自: If you lost after putting your all into it, that’s my responsibility for guiding you. If you’re going to blame the <b>, you should blame me instead of yourself. Am I wrong?
もしかしてめるはただ負けることを\n恐れているんじゃない……のか？: Maybe she's just afraid of losing......?
お前は何を怖がっている？\n自分の責任で競技に負けることだけが理由じゃなさそうだ:
What are you afraid of?
It doesn't seem like losing the competition is the only reason you're taking responsibility.
しばしの沈黙の後に、おずおずとめるが口を開いた。: After a moment of silence, she timidly opened her mouth.
%usernameusernameuserna%さんのおかげで、\nシリウスシュ: Thanks to %username, username, and userna%-san, the <b> Sirius Sugaru has finally come together well.
カラフルブーケにも勝てて、より結束が強まって……\nでも、試合に負けたらシリウス: You can even beat a colorful bouquet, and your unity will be stronger... Even if you lose a match, Sirius Sugar will be gone.
私は、みんなともっと一緒にいたいんです。みんなと、%usernameuserna: I want to be with everyone more. I want me to aim higher with everyone, with %user name, user name, and user name.
だから、そのために、本番までに何かできることはないかなって。\n私ひとりじゃ思い: That's why I thought there might be something I could do before the performance. I couldn't think of anything on my own, so I came to ask for advice.
なるほど。そういうことか……: I see. So that's how it is...
どんなネガティブな言葉を並べられるかと思っていたら、\n随分と前向きなお悩み相談:
Just when I was wondering what kind of negative words she'd be able to string together,
came to me with a rather positive discussion about her worries.
今、シリウスシュガーのなかで最も成長しているのは\n彼女であることはまず間違いな: Right now, there was little doubt that she was the most mature of Sirius Sugaru.
新技を覚え、精神的にも成長し、そして仲間のために\n自分ができることはないかと模: She's learning new techniques, growing mentally, and is starting to wonder if there's anything she can do for her friends.
それなら、俺は指揮官として彼女の期待に応えなくてはな。: In that case, as a commander, I have to live up to her expectations.
める……明日１日、俺に付き合ってくれないか？: Meguru... Will you come with me all day tomorrow?
流石に、今のお前を数日でさらに強くする手段は思いつかない。でも……勝つためにでき: Of course, I can't think of any way to make you stronger in a few days. But... I want to do everything I can to win.
わかりました……！ よろしくお願い致します！: Understood...! I look forward to working with you!
そして翌日、俺はめると連れだって、\n別の校舎へと来ていた。: And the next day, I came to another school building with Meguru.
あ、あの、ここってスカラ校舎ですよね？どうして私をここに連れてきたんですか……？: U-Um, this is the Scara building, isn't it? Why did you bring me here...?
そうそう、すぐに強くなることなんて出来ない。だからこそ、こういう時にやるべきこと: That's right, I can't get stronger right away. That'll be why there's only one thing to do at a time like this.
カオスメイデンの偵察だ。その強さの秘密や、弱点なんかも調べるぞ！: Chaos Maiden's reconnaissance. We'll find out the secrets and weaknesses of her strength!
なお、当然ながら許可など取ってないから、奴らには気づかれないように。: And of course, I didn't get permission, so don't let them notice.
